fulltext:
DAM NGOC VAN 
Senior Android Developer 
ABOUT ME 
• 
I am an Android Developer with 6 years’ experience of Android application development. I don't want to 
be rockstar coder. My main interests are everything around the product, not just technical. I will very 
appreciate if I can work the environment where I can learn something else e.g. UX, product management, 
marketing, user experience, etc 
• 
Honor 
Bronze medal for the most outstanding graduate of the bachelor programming Information Technology 
Employee of the Year2013, 2015 
Always got excellent performance evaluation 
• 
About Language:  
Vietnamese: Native 
Cantonese: Native 
English: Proficient for work 
SKILLS 
o Android, Kotlin, RxJava, Dagger,Firebase, MVVM, Mockito, Git, Svn, Jira, Android Studio, Xcode 
o Java, Jquery, Javascript, Css, Html, Xml, Json, REST, Object C, C# 
o Android Development, iOS Development, Web Development, Testing 
o Scrum, Agile, Leadership 
EXPERIENCE 
Senior Android Engineer 
Grab VietNam 
Senior Android Engineer 
Techbase VietNam – Yahoo! JAPAN 
Senior Android Developer – Android Team Leader 
FPT Telecom – FPT Play Team 
Project Manager, Team Leader, Developer 
FPT Telecom – R&D Department 
Mobile Developer 
FPT Telecom – R&D Department 
09/2018 – 11/2018 
08/2016 – 06/2018 
03/2015 – 06/2016 
04/2014 – 03/2015 
08/2012 – 04/2014 
EDUCATION 
Bachelor of Science – Hoa Sen University 
Information Technology, GPA: 8.13/10 
TOEIC certificate of achievement 
Score: 760 
ANDROIDPROJECTS 
Grab Express – Senior Android Engineer 
Grab is Southeast Asia's #1 ride-hailing app, food delivery, cashless payment solution and other logistics 
services such as GrabBike, GrabCar, GrabExpress, GrabFood, etc all in one. 
Grab Express is a logistics service offered by Grab as similar to GrabBike, GrabCar that involves only 
transport of passengers. Grab Express offers speed, convenience and safety parcel service. 
Position: Developer 
Duties: 
- 
Meeting and receive requirement directly from Seattle team for maintaining, fix bugs, 
developing new functions. Write unit test, testing 
- 
Collaborated with API team and Design team for understanding the requirement. 
- 
Collaborated with QA team for understanding bugs report 
References: 
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.grabtaxi.passenger 
https://www.grab.com/vn/en/express/ 
09/2018 – 11/2018 
Yahoo! Browser – Senior Android Engineer 
Yahoo! Browser is a browser application that automatically optimizes the memory 
of the terminal, pursues search, news, and ease of use of the game automatically 
Position: Developer 
Members: 4 
Duties: 
- 
Meeting and receive requirement directly from Japan team for maintaining, fix bugs, developing new 
functions. 
- 
Analyze, suggest possible solutions, details design, implement, write test-case, unit test, testing 
- 
Review code and report 
References: 
https://promo-ybrowser.yahoo.co.jp/ 
08/2016 – 06/2018 
ANDROIDPROJECTS 
FPT Play TV BOX - Android Team Leader, Developer 
Involve in starting a start-up project: A media sreaming set-top-box platform like Nexus 
Player, Amazon Fire TV 
Position: Android Team Leader, Developer 
Member: 2 
Duties: 
- 
Manage and leading a team consist of 2 persons including myself in designing and developing 
- 
Meeting and receive requirement directly from Project Owner. 
- 
Collaborated with API team and Design team to define, design and ship new features 
- 
Analyze, details design, maintaining, fix bugs, developing ,codereview, testingandship new release 
References: 
http://fptplay.tv/ 
03/2015 – 06/2016 
FPT Play – TV Online – Android Team Leader, Developer 
An application to watch live television streams, VOD, Live Sport streams on Android 
phone and Tablet 
Duties: 
- 
Manage and leading a team consist of 2 persons including myself in designing and developing 
- 
Meeting and receive requirement directly from Project Owner. 
- 
Collaborated with API team and Design team to define, design and ship new features 
- 
Analyze, details design, maintaining, fix bugs, developing ,codereview, testingandship new release 
References: 
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.fplay.activity 
ANDROIDPROJECTS 
FPT Play for Android TV - Project Manager, Team Leader, Developer 
An application to watch live television streams, VOD, Live Sport streams on Android Box. 
Position: Project manager, Team leader, Developer 
Members: 4 
Duties: 
- 
Planning for the project, tracking the progress of the project, reporting the status of work to 
stakeholders, HR plan for the project. 
- 
Design UX, UI. 
- 
Regularly organize seminars to report and show the demo and receive requests from the 
stakeholders. 
- 
Manage and direct a team of 3 junior developers, plan and organize work for team 
- 
Design the back-end APIs. 
- 
Design and build app project structure, develop, maintain, testing and ship new release. 
- 
Review code, support , check and track members work 
Because this is a research project of R&D team, we don't have enough resources, so I 
had the chance to try different areas: manage, design UX and UI, back-end, etc. 
It was a crazy time, but it was also very interesting. I learned a lot and worked with all 
passion and enthusiasm. This is the most happinest working time in my life. 
References: 
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=net.fptplay.ottbox 
03/2015 – 06/2016 
ANDROIDPROJECTS 
FPay - Mobile Developer 
An internal application support FPT telecom cash messenger for their daily work: push notification, assign ne 
tasks, track the worker’s location, road guide, etc for Android and iOS device. 
Position: Developer 
Members: 2 
Duties: 
- 
Meeting and receive requirement directly from ISC team 
- 
Analyze, details design, maintaining, fix bugs, developing testing and ship new release 
References: have no reference on Store because it is an internal project for FPT Telecom workers. 
FTool - Mobile Developer 
An internal application support FPT telecom workers for their daily work: push notification, assign new tasks 
track the worker’s location, road guide, etc for Android and iOS device. 
Position: Developer 
Members: 2 
Duties: 
- 
Meeting and receive requirement directly from ISC team 
- 
Analyze, details design, maintaining, fix bugs, developing testing and ship new release 
References: have no reference on Store because it is an internal project for FPT Telecom workers. 
Openet - Mobile Developer 
An internal application collects GPS coordinates data and show info on map, support worker choose location 
t deploy internet transmission line, for Android and iOS device. 
Position: Developer 
Members: 2 
Duties: 
- 
Meeting and receive requirement directly from ISC team 
- 
Analyze, details design, maintaining, fix bugs, developing testing andship new release 
References: have no reference on Store because it is an internal project for FPT Telecom workers. 
08/2012 – 04/2014 
OTHER PROJECTS 
While working at R & D Department from 2012 to 2015, I had the opportunity to participate in many projects 
not just Android. Example: Cross platform, Hybrid App, Smart TV, iOS App, join back-end team write store 
procedure by using SQL Server, etc... That’s why I had work experience in JQuery, JavaScript , HTML, CSS, 
Obje C, C#, etc 
My goal is to be an Android Developer, so I think it is unnecessary to list the other project besides Android 
tha have ever done.
